line.originaltext: 1 1/2 pounds skinless, boneless chicken breast meat
1 cup chicken broth
1/2 teaspoon salt
1/4 teaspoon ground black pepper
1 1/2 cups milk
3 tablespoons butter
1 onion, chopped
1 cup chopped celery
1/3 cup all-purpose flour
2 cups frozen mixed vegetables, thawed
1 tablespoon chopped fresh parsley
1/2 teaspoon dried thyme
1 (9 inch) pastry for a 9 inch single crust pie
1 egg, lightly beaten
In a large saucepan over medium high heat, combine the chicken meat, chicken broth, salt and pepper.
In a large saucepan over medium high heat, combine the chicken meat, chicken broth, salt and pepper.
line.annotation: combine({ing0, ing1, ing2, ing3}, ing14, "broth mixture and chicken", "")

line.originaltext: Bring to a boil and reduce heat to low.
line.annotation: cook(ing14, t0, ing15, "boiled chicken and broth mixture", "bring to a boil")

line.originaltext: Cover and let simmer for 30 minutes, or until chicken is no longer pink in the center and the juices run clear.
line.annotation: cook(ing15, t0, ing16, "cooked chicken and broth mixture", "cover, let simmer for 30 minutes, or until juices run clear")

line.originaltext: Remove the chicken and let cool.
Remove the chicken and let cool.
Pour the remaining chicken broth mixture into a measuring cup.
Pour the remaining chicken broth mixture into a measuring cup.
Let stand; spoon off fat.
line.annotation: do(ing18, t1, ing19, "broth mixture", "let stand, spoon off fat")

line.originaltext: Add enough milk to the broth mixture to equal 2 1/2 cups.
line.annotation: combine({ing19, ing4}, ing20, "milk and broth", "add only enough so the total equals 2 1/2 cups")

line.originaltext: Cut chicken into 1/2 inch pieces.
Cut chicken into 1/2 inch pieces.
line.annotation: cut(ing17, t2, ing21, "cut chicken", "into 1/2 inch pieces")

line.originaltext: In the same pan, melt butter or margarine over medium heat.
Add the onion and celery.
line.annotation: combine({ing22, ing6, ing7}, ing23, "butter, onion, celery", "")

line.originaltext: Saute, stirring, for 3 minutes.
line.annotation: cook(ing23, t0, ing24, "sauteed onion and celery", "saute for 3 minutes")

line.originaltext: Stir in flour until well blended.
line.annotation: combine({ing24, ing8}, ing25, "flour, onion, celery", "stir until well blended")

line.originaltext: Gradually stir in broth mixture.
line.annotation: combine({ing20, ing25}, ing26, "broth mixture, onion, celery", "gradually stir in")

line.originaltext: Simmer, stirring constantly, until the sauce thickens and boils.
line.annotation: cook(ing26, t0, ing27, "thickened sauce", "simmer, stir constantly until sauce thickens and boils")

line.originaltext: Add the chicken, vegetables, parsley and thyme.
line.annotation: combine({ing10, ing11, ing21, ing27, ing9}, ing28, "chicken in sauce", "")

line.originaltext: Pour mixture into a 1 1/2 quart deep casserole dish.
Pour mixture into a 1 1/2 quart deep casserole dish.
Preheat oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C).
Preheat oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C).
Roll out pastry 1 inch larger than the diameter of the casserole dish on a lightly floured surface.
Roll out pastry 1 inch larger than the diameter of the casserole dish on a lightly floured surface.
line.annotation: do(ing12, t5, ing29, "rolled pastry crust", "until 1 inch larger in diameter than the cassarole dish")

line.originaltext: Cut slits in the pastry for venting air.
line.annotation: cut(ing29, t2, ing30, "slitted pastry crust", "slit for venting air")

line.originaltext: Place pastry on top of casserole.
line.annotation: combine({ing28, ing30}, ing31, "pastry", "lay on top of cassarole")

line.originaltext: Roll edges and cut away extra pastry; flute edges by pinching together.
line.annotation: do(ing31, t2, ing32, "trimmed pastry", "cut away extra pastry, flute edges")

line.originaltext: Brush pastry with beaten egg and bake in the preheated oven for 30 minutes or until the crust is golden brown and the filling is bubbling.
Brush pastry with beaten egg and bake in the preheated oven for 30 minutes or until the crust is golden brown and the filling is bubbling.
line.annotation: combine({ing13, ing32}, ing33, "brushed pastry", "brush pastry with beaten egg")

line.originaltext: Brush pastry with beaten egg and bake in the preheated oven for 30 minutes or until the crust is golden brown and the filling is bubbling.
line.annotation: cook(ing33, t4, ing34, "baked pastry", "for 30 minutes, or until crust is golden brown")

line.originaltext: Let cool for 10 minutes and serve.
Let cool for 10 minutes and serve.
